//Get the Account names prefixed with Survey
delete [SELECT Id,Name,Title FROM Contact where TITLE='QA'];
List<Account> acctID = [Select ID from ACCOUNT where NAME like 'SURVEY Account%' limit 10];
List<String> emailIDs = new List<String>{'athaduka@gainsight.com','jvunnam@gainsight.com','ggolla@gainsight.com','srallapalli@gainsight.com','ryaddanapalli@gainsight.com','spulluri@gainsight.com','snasika@gainsight.com','rkalisipudi@gainsight.com','hsharma@gainsight.com','spadmanabhan@gainsight.com'};
List<Contact> contacts = new List<Contact>();
for(Integer i = 0; i < 10; i++){

Contact c1 = new Contact();
c1.AccountId = acctID[i].ID;
c1.FirstName = 'FName'+i;
c1.LastName = 'LName'+i; 
c1.Title = 'QA' ;  
c1.Email = emailIDs[i];
contacts.add(c1);
}
insert(contacts);
